SqlQuery.Data: SELECT distinct IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst FROM event LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment on (acknowledgment.sid = event.sid AND acknowledgment.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN acknowledgment_class on (acknowledgment_class.id = acknowledgment.class ) #WHERE#
